Description:
Model
Brand: ASUS
Model: B760M-AYW WIFI D4 II


Supported CPU
CPU Socket Type: LGA 1700
CPU Type: Celeron / Intel Core 12th Gen (LGA 1700) / Intel Core 13th Gen (LGA 1700) / Intel Core 14th Gen (LGA 1700) / Pentium Gold


Chipsets
Chipset: Intel B760


Memory
Number of Memory Slots: 2x288pin (DDR4)
Memory Standard: DDR4 2133 / DDR4 2400 / DDR4 2666 / DDR4 2667 / DDR4 2933 / DDR4 3200 / DDR4 3333 / DDR4 3400 / DDR4 3466 / DDR4 3600 / DDR4 3733 / DDR4 4000 / DDR4 4266 / DDR4 4400 / DDR4 4600 / DDR4 4800 / DDR4 5000 / DDR4 5066 / DDR4 5333
Maximum Memory Supported: 64GB
Channel Supported: Dual Channel


Expansion Slots
PCI Express 5.0 x16: 1 x PCI Express 5.0 x16
PCI Express x1: 2 x PCIe 4.0 x1 slots


Storage Devices
Serial ATA (SATA): 4 x SATA 6Gb/s
M.2: Intel Core Processors (14th & 13th & 12th Gen)
M.2_1 slot (Key M), type 2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)
Intel B760 Chipset
M.2_2 slot (Key M), type 2280 (supports PCIe 4.0 x4 mode)
SATA RAID: 0/1/5/10


Onboard Audio
Audio Channels: Realtek 7.1 Surround Sound High Definition Audio CODEC*
- Supports: Jack-detection, Multi-streaming, Front Panel Jack-retasking
- Supports up to 24-Bit/192 kHz playback
Audio Features 
- Audio Shielding
- Premium audio capacitors
- Dedicated audio PCB layers
* A chassis with an HD audio module in the front panel is required to support 7.1 Surround Sound audio output.


Rear Panel Ports
Back I/O Ports: 4 x USB 5Gbps ports (4 x Type-A)
2 x USB 2.0 ports (2 x Type-A)
1 x HDMITM port
1 x Wi-Fi Module
1 x Realtek 2.5Gb Ethernet port
3 x Audio jacks


Internal I/O Connectors
Onboard USB: 1 x USB 5Gbps header supports 2 additional USB 5Gbps ports
1 x USB 2.0 header supports 2 additional USB 2.0 ports
Other Connectors: Fan and Cooling Related 
1 x 4-pin CPU Fan header
2 x 4-pin Chassis Fan headers

Miscellaneous
3 x Addressable RGB Gen 2 headers
1 x Clear CMOS header
1 x COM port header
1 x Front Panel Audio header (F_AUDIO)
1 x S/PDIF out header
1 x Speaker header
1 x SPI TPM header (14-1pin)
1 x 10-1 pin Front Panel System header


Software Feature
BIOS Feature: 128 Mb Flash ROM, UEFI AMI BIOS
Software: ASUS Exclusive Software
Armoury Crate
- Aura Sync
- Fan Xpert 2+
- Two-Way AI Noise Cancellation
ASUS DriverHub
-ASUS CPU-Z
AI Suite 3
- DIGI+ VRM
- PC Cleaner
Norton 360 Deluxe (60 Days Free Trial)
WinRAR (40 Days Free Trial)
UEFI BIOS
ASUS EZ DIY 
- ASUS CrashFree BIOS 3 
- ASUS EZ Flash 3 
- ASUS UEFI BIOS EZ Mode
Windows 11: Supported


Physical Spec
Form Factor: Micro ATX
Dimensions (W x L): 9.6" x 8.3"
Power Pin: 1 x 24-pin Main Power connector
1 x 8-pin +12V CPU Power connector


Features
Features: ASUS 5X PROTECTION III 
- DIGI+ VRM
- LANGuard 
- Overvoltage protection
- SafeSlot
- Stainless-steel back I/O
ASUS Q-Design 
- M.2 Q-Latch
- Q-DIMM
- Q-LED Core
- Q-Slot
ASUS EZ DIY
- ProCool
ASUS Thermal Solution
- M.2 heatsink

Aura Sync
- Addressable RGB Gen 2 headers

2 x SATA 6Gb/s cables
